metadata.title: CVE-2021-30889 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in macOS Monterey 12.0.1, iOS 15.1 and iPadOS 15.1, watchOS 8.1, tvOS 15.1. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

notes.note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.34.1-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
wpewebkit package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
